sentences.en: Here is the application that will help forester in collecting some data relating to forest enventory.
sentences.cn: 这个应用程序可以帮助林务人员收集一些关于森林的数据,它增加了一些报表功能,更改系统字体.

sentences.en: Mr. Forester. When do we expect you to come?
Seeing this, the forester also stopped.

sentences.cn: 谢谢您, 福雷斯特先生.

sentences.en: The forester asked them, " Would you buy tusks that come from living elephants? "
sentences.cn: 他便问他们: “ 你们会买从活象身上取来的象牙 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: The forester departed carrying the bloody ivory stumps.
sentences.cn: 那人拿着血淋淋的象牙离开了.

sentences.en: The forester has explored those tropical rain forests.
sentences.cn: 那个林务员已经勘测了那些热带雨林.

sentences.en: Then the Enlightenment Being took the forester to his own secluded dwelling place.
sentences.cn: 仁慈象王就把此人带到自己隐居的地方.

sentences.en: There are practical difficulties in determining how much is relevant to the forester.
sentences.cn: 究竟有多少对于林业工作者是适用的,实际上就难说了.

sentences.en: We look forward to welcoming you, Mr. Forester.
sentences.cn: 福雷斯特先生, 我们恭候您的光临.

sentences.en: With one blow of his ax, the forester cleaved the tree stump down the center.
sentences.cn: 森林管理员用他的斧头砍了一下, 树椿便从中间裂开.

trans.tran_en: someone who works in a forest taking care of, planting, and cutting down the trees
